text: 1:23 Godɨn Araziba 4:16-18; Onger Akaba 106:20; Jeremaia 2:11; Esekiel 8:10; Aposel 17:29Me Godɨn zurara itim akɨrim a gasara, egha an ziam fer pu. Puvatɨ. Me aremeghamin gumazamizibar mɨn gara, marvir guaba ko, kuaraziba ko, asɨziba ko, kuruziba ko, ipebar marvir guabar ingara, egha da isa dar ziaba fe.
